p: All acute phase samples from AP and RJ were quantified by qRT-PCR and the results demonstrated low viral titers, which does not corroborate with the high viremia observed during this infection, which can increase from 10 9 to 10 12 copies of RNA/mL [ 44, 45]. The low viral titer obtained here may be due a test limitation or sensitivity. Although higher, there are no major differences between the high viremia in acute symptomatic patients when compared to the asymptomatic patients [ 42].
